Maps.Name: Die Maschine
Maps.Description:
All Coming Soon!
• Pack-A-Punch Guide (Coming Soon)
• Aetherscope
•D.I.E Wonderweapon Guides
• Side Easter Egg Guides
• Easter Egg Guide (Coming Soon)

Steps.ImageDescription: This Guide is Coming Soon!
You need to find 3 parts. Each part always spawns in the exact same location but only 1 part spawns at a time, so you'll need to check all 3 locations multiple times!

Steps.ImageLabel: Location One - Wing of the Crash Site Plane
Steps.ImageDescription: Pick it up!

Steps.ImageLabel: Location Two - Pack-A-Punch Room Behind Living Room Tunnel
Steps.ImageDescription: Pick it up!

Steps.ImageLabel: Location Three - Under Outside Stairs of Nacht
Steps.ImageDescription: Pick it up!
The workbench can be found beneath the Pack-A-Punch Machine.

Steps.ImageLabel: Turn on Power and open Pack-A-Punch!
Steps.ImageDescription: You'll need to get to rounds 8-10!
It will drop a keycard. Pick it up.

Steps.ImageLabel: Take the card to the Weapons Lab!
Steps.ImageDescription: Use the keycard on this machine.

Steps.ImageLabel: Go to the Living Room Location!
Interact with the machine through the crack in the wall!
Steps.ImageDescription: This will turn on a trap

Steps.ImageLabel: Get around 30 kills with the trap!

Steps.ImageDescription: This will open a door.

Steps.ImageLabel: You can now pickup the D.I.E Shockwave Wonderweapon!

Overview.Title: Upgrade Guides
Overview.Description:
• D.I.E Thermophasic
• D.I.E Electrobolt
• D.I.E Nova-5
• D.I.E Cryo-Emitter

Steps.ImageLabel: Enter Aether Portal in the Pond Area

Steps.ImageDescription: The plane nose will be lifted in the air.
This will open it.
Opposite Deadshot there will be a Laser.
This will place the fuse.
On the back of a truck there will be a Weapon Crate
You will get the D.I.E Thermophasic.

Steps.ImageLabel: Turn on Power and open Pack-A-Punch!
Steps.ImageDescription: You'll need to get to rounds 8-10!

Steps.ImageLabel: Go to the penthouse of the Nacht Building
Install the empty canister to the cleaning unit
Steps.ImageDescription: This is in the weapons lab next to Deadshot.

Steps.ImageLabel: Kill a Plaguehound Dog next to the canister
Steps.ImageDescription: Wait for the canister to fill up.

Steps.ImageLabel: Go to Crash Site Weapon Crate
Interact with the Box to swap to the Nova-5 Version
Go to the 'Penthouse' of the Nacht building!
Steps.ImageDescription: Shoot off the crate with the Shockwave

Steps.ImageLabel: Get a Megaton to shoot this mushroom on the side of this tree. It's located in between Pond and Crash Site
Steps.ImageDescription: It will glow purple once it's been shot.

Steps.ImageLabel: Wait until the flask is filled up
Steps.ImageDescription: Pick it up once it's filled.
Use the flask on this weapon crate. You'll now be able to upgrade.

Overview.Title: Side Easter Egg Guides
Overview.Description:
• 'Alone' Song
• Coffin Meme (Free Stuff)
• 1500 Free Points
• Distant Monster

Steps.ImageDescription: This will play the music!

Steps.ImageLabel: Go to the Medical Bay Site
Steps.ImageDescription: The plane nose will be lifted in the air.
